Female01_Glasses_qmask_00_description

A replica of the mask worn by Dark Lily Matsushima, top lieutenant of the Black Irem Brigade. As purple is her favorite color, Lily is most commonly seen wearing this particular mask. Just wearing this mask seems to imbue the wearer with Lily's sensual beauty.[#Legal]

Une réplique du masque porté par Dark Lily Matsushima, lieutenant chef de la Brigade Noire Irem. Comme le violet est sa couleur préférée, c'est ce masque que Lily porte le plus souvent. Le simple fait de porter ce masque semble imprégner le porteur de la beauté sensuelle de Lily. [#Legal]

Eine Replik der von Dark Lily Matsushima, Oberleutnant der Black Irem Brigade, getragenen Maske. Lila ist ihre Lieblingsfarbe und sie trägt daher diese Maske besonders häufig. Das Tragen dieser Maske scheint den Träger mit der sinnlichen Schönheit von Lily zu durchtränken.[#Legal]

Replica della maschera indossata da Dark Lily Matsushima, alto ufficiale della Brigata Black Irem. Questa è la maschera in assoluto più usata, dal momento che lei adora il colore viola. Tutta la femminilità di Dark Lily fluirà nel vostro corpo nel momento stesso in cui l'appoggerete sugli occhi.[#Legal]

Una réplica de la máscara que llevaba Dark Lily Matsushima, teniente en jefe del Escuadrón Irem Negro. Como el púrpura es su color favorito, es muy habitual ver a Lily con esta máscara en particular. El mero hecho de ponerse esta máscara parece impregnar a su portador con la belleza sensual de Lily.[#Legal]
ブラックアイレム団の幹部ダークリリー松嶋が愛用している仮面のレプリカ。「紫」は彼女がもっとも好む色で着用していることが多い。この仮面だけで彼女の色香が漂ってくるようだ。[#Legal]
블랙 아이렘단의 간부 다크 릴리 마츠시마가 애용하던 가면 레플리카.「보라색」은 그녀가 가장 좋아하는 색으로, 자주 착용한다. 이 가면만으로도 그녀의 미색이 느껴지는 것 같다. [#Legal]

A replica of the mask worn and loved by Dark-Lily Matsushima, leader of the Black Irem Brigade. Purple is her favorite color, and she wears this one often. The mask alone seems to evoke her charm.[#Legal]
黑色Irem團的幹部Dark-Lily Matsushima愛用面具的複製品。「紫色」是她最喜愛的顏色所以經常使用。光有這個面具就彷彿能夠聞到她的香味。[#Legal]
黑色Irem團的幹部Dark-Lily Matsushima愛用面具的複製品。「紫色」是她最喜愛的顏色所以經常使用。光有這個面具就彷彿能夠聞到她的香味。[#Legal]

A replica of the mask worn by Dark Lily Matsushima, top lieutenant of the Black Irem Brigade. As purple is her favorite color, Lily is most commonly seen wearing this particular mask. Just wearing this mask seems to imbue the wearer with Lily's sensual beauty.[#Legal]
